dns
***


Description
===========

CLI for managing DNS zones, records, and policies.


Available Commands
==================

* record

  * domain

    * delete

    * get

    * patch

    * update

  * rrset

    * delete

    * get

    * patch

    * update

  * zone

    * get

    * patch

    * update

* zone

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update
